Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Decap CMS for content management

Added a complete CMS system for group leaders to manage their content:

Features:
- User-friendly admin interface at /admin
- Research group page editing with team member management
- News item creation and management
- Image uploads with automatic optimization
- GitHub-based authentication and version control

Structure:
- app/admin/page.tsx - Admin interface page
- public/admin/config.yml - CMS configuration
- public/admin/index.html - CMS entry point
- CMS-SETUP.md - Complete setup and usage documentation

Collections configured:
- Research groups \(descriptions, team members, publications\)
- News items \(with featured image support\)
- People/PIs \(profiles, photos, contact info\)

Benefits:
- No database needed - all content in Git
- Full version control of all changes
- Easy rollback through GitHub
- Group leaders can update their pages independently
- Automatic site rebuild on Vercel after edits

See CMS-SETUP.md for complete setup instructions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix CMS build error - use CDN version instead

Changed approach to use standalone HTML with CDN-hosted Decap CMS
instead of npm package to avoid Next.js compatibility issues.

Changes:
- Modified app/admin/page.tsx to redirect to /admin/index.html
- Removed decap-cms-app npm package
- CMS now loads via CDN from public/admin/index.html

This resolves build errors related to Node.js modules \(ajv, ajv-errors\)
being imported in browser context.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
